channel.title: types on darktable lua documentation
channel.description: Recent content in types on darktable lua documentation

item.title: overview
item.description: This section documents types that are specific to darktable’s Lua API.

item.title: lua_os_type
item.description: enum The type of OS we darktable can run on Values : windows macos linux unix

item.title: dt_lua_image_t
item.description: dt_type Image objects represent an image in the database. This is slightly different from a file on disk since a file can have multiple developments. Note that this is the real image object; changing the value of a field will immediately change it in darktable and will be reflected on any copy of that image object you may have kept. Attributes: has_tostring ðŸ”—dt_lua_image_t.attach_tag see darktable.tags.attach ðŸ”—dt_lua_image_t.detach_tag see darktable.tags.detach

item.title: dt_imageio_module_format_t
item.description: dt_type A virtual type representing all format types. ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_t.plugin_name string A unique name for the plugin. ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_t.name string A human readable name for the plugin. ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_t.extension string The typical filename extension for that format. ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_t.mime string The mime type associated with the format. ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_t.max_width number The max width allowed for the format (0 = unlimited). Attributes: write 2.3.6. dt_imageio_module_format_t.max_height number The max height allowed for the format (0 = unlimited).

item.description: dt_type Type object describing parameters to export to webp. Attributes: parent : types.dt_imageio_module_format_t ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_data_webp.quality number The quality to use at export time. Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_data_webp.comp_type types.comp_type_t The overall quality to use; can be one of “webp_lossy” or “webp_lossless”. Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_imageio_module_format_data_webp.hint types.hint_t A hint on the overall content of the image. Attributes: write

item.description: enum The different page types for PDF export Values : all single contact

item.title: dt_lua_film_t
item.description: dt_type A film in darktable; this represents a directory containing imported images. Attributes: has_tostring ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.move_image see darktable.database.move_image ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.copy_image see darktable.database.copy_image ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.# types.dt_lua_image_t The different images within the film. ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.id number A unique numeric id used by this film. Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.path string The path represented by this film. Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_lua_film_t.delete self:function( [force : boolean] ) Removes the film from the database. self - types.

item.title: dt_style_t

Attributes: has_tostring ðŸ”—dt_style_t.delete see darktable.styles.delete ðŸ”—dt_style_t.duplicate see darktable.styles.duplicate ðŸ”—dt_style_t.apply see darktable.styles.apply ðŸ”—dt_style_t.export see darktable.styles.export ðŸ”—dt_style_t.name string The name of the style. ðŸ”—dt_style_t.description string The description of the style. ðŸ”—dt_style_t.# types.dt_style_item_t The different items that make the style.

Attributes: has_tostring ðŸ”—dt_lua_tag_t.delete see darktable.tags.delete ðŸ”—dt_lua_tag_t.attach see darktable.tags.attach ðŸ”—dt_lua_tag_t.detach see darktable.tags.detach ðŸ”—dt_lua_tag_t.name string The name of the tag. ðŸ”—dt_lua_tag_t.# types.dt_lua_image_t The images that have that tag attached to them.

item.title: dt_lua_lib_t
item.description: dt_type The type of a UI lib ðŸ”—dt_lua_lib_t.id string A unit string identifying the lib ðŸ”—dt_lua_lib_t.name string The translated title of the UI element ðŸ”—dt_lua_lib_t.version number The version of the internal data of this lib ðŸ”—dt_lua_lib_t.visible boolean Allow to make a lib module completely invisible to the user. Note that if the module is invisible the user will have no way to restore it without lua Attributes: implicit_yield write ðŸ”—dt_lua_lib_t.

item.title: dt_lua_view_t
item.description: dt_type A darktable view ðŸ”—dt_lua_view_t.id string A unique string identifying the view ðŸ”—dt_lua_view_t.name string The name of the view

item.title: dt_lua_backgroundjob_t
item.description: dt_type A lua-managed entry in the backgroundjob lib ðŸ”—dt_lua_backgroundjob_t.percent number The value of the progress bar, between 0 and 1. will return nil if there is no progress bar, will raise an error if read or written on an invalid job Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_lua_backgroundjob_t.valid boolean True if the job is displayed, set it to false to destroy the entry An invalid job cannot be made valid again Attributes:

item.title: dt_lua_snapshot_t
item.description: dt_type The description of a snapshot in the snapshot lib Attributes: has_tostring ðŸ”—dt_lua_snapshot_t.filename string The filename of an image containing the snapshot ðŸ”—dt_lua_snapshot_t.select self:function( ) Activates this snapshot on the display. To deactivate all snapshot you need to call this function on the active snapshot self - types.dt_lua_snapshot_t - The snapshot to activate ðŸ”—dt_lua_snapshot_t.name string The name of the snapshot, as seen in the UI

item.title: hint_t
item.description: enum a hint on the way to encode a webp image Values: hint_default hint_picture hint_photo hint_graphic

item.title: dt_ui_container_t
item.description: enum A place in the darktable UI where a lib can be placed Values: DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_LEFT_TOP DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_LEFT_CENTER DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_LEFT_BOTTOM DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_RIGHT_TOP DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_RIGHT_CENTER DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_RIGHT_BOTTOM DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_TOP_LEFT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_TOP_CENTER DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_TOP_RIGHT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_TOP_LEFT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_TOP_CENTER DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_TOP_RIGHT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_BOTTOM_LEFT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_BOTTOM_CENTER DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_CENTER_BOTTOM_RIGHT DT_UI_CONTAINER_PANEL_BOTTOM

item.title: snapshot_direction_t
item.description: enum Which part of the main window is occupied by a snapshot Values: left right top bottom

item.title: dt_imageio_j2k_format_t
item.description: enum J2K format type Values: j2k jp2

item.title: dt_imageio_j2k_preset_t
item.description: enum J2K preset type Values: off cinema2k_24 cinema2k_48 cinema4k_24

item.title: comp_type_t
item.description: enum Type of compression for webp Values: webp_lossy webp_lossless

item.title: lua_pref_type
item.description: enum The type of value to save in a preference Values: enum directory file string bool integer float lua

item.title: dt_imageio_exr_compression_t
item.description: enum The type of compression to use for the EXR image Values: off rle zips zip piz pxr24 b44 b44a

item.title: dt_lib_collect_params_rule_t
item.description: dt_type A single rule for filtering a collection ðŸ”—dt_lib_collect_params_rule_t.mode types.dt_lib_collect_mode_t How this rule is applied after the previous one. Unused for the first rule Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_lib_collect_params_rule_t.data string The text segment of the rule. Exact content depends on the type of rule Attributes: write ðŸ”—dt_lib_collect_params_rule_t.item types.dt_collection_properties_t The item on which this rule filter. i.e the type of the rule Attributes: write

item.title: dt_lib_collect_mode_t
item.description: enum The logical operators to apply between rulesAttributes: Values: DT_LIB_COLLECT_MODE_AND DT_LIB_COLLECT_MODE_OR DT_LIB_COLLECT_MODE_AND_NOT

item.title: dt_collection_properties_t
item.description: enum The different elements on which a collection can be filtered Values: DT_COLLECTION_PROP_FILMROLL DT_COLLECTION_PROP_FOLDERS DT_COLLECTION_PROP_CAMERA DT_COLLECTION_PROP_TAG DT_COLLECTION_PROP_DAY DT_COLLECTION_PROP_TIME DT_COLLECTION_PROP_IMPORT_TIMESTAMP DT_COLLECTION_PROP_CHANGE_TIMESTAMP DT_COLLECTION_PROP_EXPORT_TIMESTAMP DT_COLLECTION_PROP_PRINT_TIMESTAMP DT_COLLECTION_PROP_HISTORY DT_COLLECTION_PROP_COLORLABEL DT_COLLECTION_PROP_TITLE DT_COLLECTION_PROP_DESCRIPTION DT_COLLECTION_PROP_CREATOR DT_COLLECTION_PROP_PUBLISHER DT_COLLECTION_PROP_RIGHTS DT_COLLECTION_PROP_LENS DT_COLLECTION_PROP_FOCAL_LENGTH DT_COLLECTION_PROP_ISO DT_COLLECTION_PROP_APERTURE DT_COLLECTION_PROP_FILENAME DT_COLLECTION_PROP_GEOTAGGING

item.title: dt_collection_sort_t
item.description: enum The different elements on which a collection can be sorted Values: DT_COLLECTION_SORT_NONE DT_COLLECTION_SORT_FILENAME DT_COLLECTION_SORT_DATETIME DT_COLLECTION_SORT_RATING DT_COLLECTION_SORT_ID DT_COLLECTION_SORT_COLOR DT_COLLECTION_SORT_GROUP DT_COLLECTION_SORT_PATH DT_COLLECTION_SORT_CUSTOM_ORDER DT_COLLECTION_SORT_TITLE DT_COLLECTION_SORT_DESCRIPTION DT_COLLECTION_SORT_ASPECT_RATIO DT_COLLECTION_SORT_SHUFFLE

item.title: dt_collection_sort_order_t
item.description: enum The different orders that a collection can be sorted in Values: DT_COLLECTION_SORT_ORDER_ASCENDING DT_COLLECTION_SORT_ORDER_DESCENDING

item.title: dt_collection_filter_t
item.description: enum The different elements on which a collection can be filtered Values: DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_ALL DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_NO DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_1 DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_2 DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_3 DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_4 DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_STAR_5 DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_REJECT DT_COLLECTION_FILTER_NOT_REJECT

item.title: dt_collection_rating_comperator_t
item.description: enum The different ways in which a collection filter can be compared Values: DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_LT DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_LEQ DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_EQ DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_GEQ DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_GT DT_COLLECTION_RATING_COMP_NE DT_COLLECTION_RATING_N_COMPS

item.title: dt_lua_orientation_t
item.description: enum A possible orientation for a widget Values: horizontal vertical

item.title: dt_lua_align_t
item.description: enum The alignment of a label Values: fill start end center baseline

item.title: dt_lua_ellipsize_mode_t
item.description: enum The ellipsize mode of a label Values: none start middle end

item.title: dt_lua_cairo_t
item.description: dt_type A wrapper around a cairo drawing context. You probably shouldn’t use this after the callback that got it passed returned. For more details of the member functions have a look at the cairo documentation for the drawing context, transformations and paths. ðŸ”—dt_lua_cairo_t.save self:function( ) Save the state of the drawing context. self - types.dt_lua_cairo_t - The context to modify. ðŸ”—types.dt_lua_cairo_t.restore self:function( ) Restore a previously saved state.

item.title: dt_ui_panel_t
item.description: enum The different user interface panels Values: DT_UI_PANEL_TOP DT_UI_PANEL_CENTER_TOP DT_UI_PANEL_CENTER_BOTTOM DT_UI_PANEL_LEFT DT_UI_PANEL_RIGHT DT_UI_PANEL_BOTTOM DT_UI_PANEL_SIZE

item.title: dt_lighttable_layout_t
item.description: enum The different lighttable layouts Values: DT_LIGHTTABLE_LAYOUT_FIRST DT_LIGHTTABLE_LAYOUT_ZOOMABLE DT_LIGHTTABLE_LAYOUT_FILEMANAGER DT_LIGHTTABLE_LAYOUT_CULLING DT_LIGHTTABLE_LAYOUT_LAST

Attributes: write ðŸ”—lua_widget.sensitive boolean Set if the widget is enabled/disabled Attributes: write ðŸ”—lua_widget.tooltip string or nil Tooltip to display for the widget Attributes: write ðŸ”—lua_widget.reset_callback function( widget : types.

item.title: lua_container
item.description: dt_type A widget containing other widgets Attributes: has_tostring parent : types.lua_widget ðŸ”—lua_container.__call see types.lua_widget.As a function ðŸ”—lua_container.extra registration parameters This widget has no extra registration parameters ðŸ”—lua_container.# types.lua_widget The widgets contained by the box. You can append widgets by adding them at the end of the list. You can remove widgets by setting them to nil. Attributes: write

item.title: lua_combobox
item.description: dt_type A widget with multiple text entries in a menu. This widget can be set as editable at construction time. If it is editable the user can type a value and is not constrained by the values in the menu. Attributes: has_tostring parent : types.lua_widget ðŸ”—lua_combobox.__call see types.lua_widget.As a function ðŸ”—lua_combobox.extra registration parameters This widget has no extra registration parameters ðŸ”—lua_combobox.value string The text content of the selected entry, can be nil.

item.title: lua_stack
